rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows and concrete surfaces typical of Brutalist design. Features a modern home theater setup integrated into one wall, including a retractable screen, surround sound speakers, and built-in seating for 6.
Open-concept kitchen adjoining the living room, equipped with functional cabinetry and industrial-style appliances. The design emphasizes simplicity in line with Brutalist aesthetics.
Separate dining space that can be used as an additional seating or study area, merging seamlessly with the living room.
Large bedroom area featuring a private balcony adhering to Vastu principles for positive energy flow. Uses raw concrete finishes and minimalistic interiors.
Compact study or office space located adjacent to the living room, offering natural light from a high window.
Fully functional bathroom with contemporary fixtures and Vastu compliant layout ensuring proper drainage and privacy.

openings.description: Large fixed windows with concrete mullions throughout the studio to allow natural light and adhere to Vastu principles.
